original_title: Six Variations on the Same Theme: Third Variation
overview: Six Variations presents six silent short films, each with their own unique visual motif that abstracts, interferes with, and obfuscates an archival reel of Kodachrome home movies. The third variation digitally joins the home movies that unite all six films, presented in black & white, with analog video.
title: Six Variations on the Same Theme: Third Variation
